TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUIService

summary.span: 启用与开发环境对象（正在承载设计器）的用户界面的交互。

span.span: Enables interaction with the user interface of the development environment object that is hosting the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过 dictionary 属性显示错误消息、显示对话框和获取主机的环境属性，如对话框和配色方案的字体 。 can display error messages, show dialog boxes, and get ambient properties of the host, such as the font for dialog boxes and color schemes, through the dictionary property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个设计器，该设计器提供调用的方法的设计器谓词菜单命令 。The following code example creates a designer that provides designer verb menu commands that call methods of the . 若要使用此示例，请将示例代码编译为程序集，并在 Windows 窗体应用程序中添加对程序集的引用。To use the example, compile the sample code to an assembly, and add a reference to the assembly in a Windows Forms application. 如果使用的是 Visual Studio，会 `IUIServiceExampleControl` 自动将添加到 " **工具箱**"。If you are using Visual Studio, the `IUIServiceExampleControl` is automatically added to the **Toolbox**. 将的实例添加 `IUIServiceExampleControl` 到 。Add an instance of the `IUIServiceExampleControl` to a . 若要访问调用方法的设计器谓词命令 ，请右键单击控件的图面，或单击控件的智能标记标志符号并从智能标记面板中选择一个项。To access the designer verb commands that invoke methods, either right-click on the control's surface or click on the control's smart tag glyph and select an item from the smart tag panel. [!code-cpp[IUIServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IUIServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IUIServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IUIServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IUIServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IUIServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

param.span: 要检查其是否支持显示 的组件。

summary.span: 指示该组件是否可显示 。

span.span: Indicates whether the component can display a .

returns.span: 如果指定的组件可以显示组件编辑器窗体，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified component can display a component editor form; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件编辑器可以显示类似于组件对象模型中的属性页 (COM) 的组件编辑器窗体。Component editors can display a component editor form that is similar to a property page from the Component Object Model (COM). 此方法检查以确定指定组件是否具有 可显示的 。This method checks to determine whether the specified component has a that can display a .

summary.span: 获取在显示对话框时应该用作所有者的窗口。

span.span: Gets the window that should be used as the owner when showing dialog boxes.

returns.span: ，指示窗口拥有任何子对话框。

span.span: An that indicates the window to own any child dialog boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些对话框是所有者应用程序的父级，在任务列表中不可见。Some dialog boxes are parented to an owner application and are not visible in the task list. 此方法返回一个 ，它指示应作为此排序对话框的所有者的窗口，该窗口是从集成开发环境中生成的。This method returns an that indicates the window that should be the owner for dialog boxes of this sort that are spawned from an integrated development environment.

public: void SetUIDirty();

summary.span: 设置指示 UI 已更改的标志。

span.span: Sets a flag indicating the UI has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法指示 UI 已更改并应进行刷新。This method indicates that the UI has been changed and should be refreshed. 务必需要在工具栏或菜单项的状态发生更改时进行刷新。It is important to indicate the need for a refresh whenever a toolbar or menu item's status changes. 大多数开发环境缓存这些元素的状态以获得速度，并需要知道何时需要更新它们。Most development environments cache the status of these elements for speed, and need to know when they need to be updated. 例如，在设计器视图中选择对象后，将调用此方法以启用剪切和复制菜单项。This method is called, for example, after objects have been selected within designer view to enable the cut and copy menu items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 (COM) 组件对象模型中的属性页类似。A is similar to a property page from the Component Object Model (COM). 如果组件不支持组件编辑器， 则会引发。If the component does not support component editors, an is thrown. 若要避免此情况，请确保 先调用。To avoid this, be sure to call first.

exception.span: 组件不支持组件编辑器。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IDictionary Styles { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.IDictionary Styles
Public ReadOnly Property Styles As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ Styles { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };
member this.Styles : System.Collections.IDictionary

summary.span: 获取特定于宿主环境的样式集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of styles that are specific to the host's environment.
An containing style settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典可以提供主机环境中的信息。The dictionary can provide information from the host environment. 这至少包含了标准 UI 文本应使用的字体和用于突出显示的颜色。At a minimum, this consists of the font that should be used for standard UI text, and the color to use for highlighting. 这些必需的样式为 "DialogFont" 和 "HighlightColor"。These required styles are "DialogFont" and "HighlightColor". 可以通过使用样式作为字典的键来检索这些样式的值，并使用键作为索引器来访问字典。The values for these styles may be retrieved by using the style as a key for the dictionary, accessing the dictionary using the key as an indexer. 例如： (实现 ) 的对象。样式 [ (用引号括起来) ] 的样式名称字符串。For example: (object implementing ).Styles[(style name string in quotes)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从宿主环境中获取对话框字体。The following code example gets the dialog box font from the host environment. [!code-cpp[Classic IUIService.Styles Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IUIService.Styles Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IUIService.Styles Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IUIService.Styles Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IUIService.Styles Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IUIService.Styles Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
